data.caption: Change in Management
data.news_body: KN Agri Resources Limited has informed the Exchange about Appointment of Mr. Anuj Banshilal Golecha (DIN: 07593380), as a Non-Executive, Independent Directorof the Company

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: KN Agri Resources Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy Srutinizers report of  Postal Ballot

data.caption: Reply to Clarification- Financial results
data.news_body: The Exchange had sought clarification from KN Agri Resources Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company was required to clarify the following:   The response of the Company is enclosed.

data.caption: Reply to Clarification- Financial results
data.news_body: The Exchange had sought clarification from KN Agri Resources Limited for the quarter ended 31-Mar-2024 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company was required to clarify the following:   -1. Consolidated Financial Results not submitted The response of the Company is enclosed.

data.news_body: KN Agri Resources Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Notice of Postal Ballot

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: KN Agri Resources Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: KN Agri Resources Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Intimation of Listing of equity shares of the Company on Capital Market Segment (Main Board) pursuant to Migration from SME Emerge platform'.
